answers.answer: Hi there!While it may take a few days to heal after the surgery, the process could be relatively slower in diabetics but would not make a big difference if the diabetes is well controlled. Circumcision is a minor procedure with usual excellent results and should not be anything to worry about.Hope this is helpful.Take care!

question: My husband is due to go in for a circumcision on tuesday as a result of phimosis.  He is very worried as we are due to go on holiday 10 days later and doesn´t know what the healing time will be, and also as he has diabetes he is worried that it will take a lot longer to heal.  Is there anyone that can shed some light on this for me please?
title: Circumcision in Older Men
